name: Real-Time Assist Replay Time ～1 minute until closing～
name_original: Real-Time Assist Replay Time ～1 minute until closing～
description:
Experience the near-future slot game "Untap, Girls" featuring infinite ART with no wait time for non-stop spinning!
Follow the push-order navigation, and you can earn endlessly until the store closes!
Just when you enter the dream-like infinite ART, there's only one minute left until closing time...

Every Japanese slot player has gone through the "bonus rush just before closing."
With frustration and haste, accurately press the lever, bet, and buttons!
Show off your concentration and see how much you can collect in a short amount of time!

No need for timing precision!
By following the on-screen instructions and pressing buttons, you can increase your medals in this game that focuses solely on the most satisfying part of slots - the "Assist Replay Time (ART)."
After launching the game, hit the lever to start! Try to earn as many medals as you can before the time displayed in the upper left corner runs out!
Follow the push order navigation (*)

There's also an online ranking to see how much you can earn in one minute!
Use the medals you collect for the "Gratitude Lottery"!
Aim to complete all 60 items!

*Push Order Navigation:
The numbers "1," "2," and "3" displayed above the three stop buttons.
The character will navigate you to press the "left," "middle," or "right" buttons next.
By pressing the stop buttons in the order shown, you can line up winning combinations and increase your medals.
If you press the buttons in the wrong order, the combination won't be successful, and you won't gain any medals.
